alert.note: Alert for Spink (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 23 at 9:28PM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... James River At Ashton affecting Spink County. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River At Ashton. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.5 feet, The water overtops the bridge 3 miles north and 1 1/2 mile east of Ashton * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 PM CDT Monday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 PM CDT Monday was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 15.9 feet early Sunday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Wednesday night.
